resources.string: Please allow Location Permissions - Google requires this for your phone to scan for another phone’s Bluetooth. We do not use or store your location.
OpenTrace needs save files for logs (Debug builds only)
This device does not support BLE
Help stop the spread of COVID-19 by turning Bluetooth on
If you had close contact with a COVID-19 case, we help the health authorities call you more quickly, to provide guidance and care.
To protect those around you, OTC may also ask you to share your data.
We use Bluetooth signals to determine if you are near another OpenTrace user.
This proximity data is encrypted and stored only on your phone.
OTC will seek your consent to upload the data, if it\'s needed for contact tracing.
We\'ll contact you if you had close contact with a COVID-19 case.
Setting up for your family? \nUse their number instead of yours.
A 6-digit code has been sent to %s.
Select \'Yes\' or \'Allow\' for the next few screens to set up.
Android needs Location Permissions for Bluetooth to work. We don\'t have access to your physical location.
App permissions are fully set up
Please leave all settings on until the outbreak ends.
We\'ll text you a One-Time Pin (OTP)
How you can help stop the spread of COVID-19
Keep app open, and let it run in the background until the end of the outbreak
Ask friends and family to help
Help stop the virus spread by allowing all permissions
Data has been uploaded to contact tracers
By uploading, you agree to share with OTC your OpenTrace proximity data for the past 21 days. We do not collect any geolocation or personal data.
Application needs location permission in order to work. Do you want to enable location permission?
Your consent is needed for the following:
To store your mobile number in a secured OpenTrace registry
To allow OpenTrace users to send OTC information of encounters with you, if they are confirmed or suspected to have COVID-19
Please enter the OTP sent to your mobile phone via sms
Keep push notifications on too, so we can alert you if the app is not scanning.
An error has occurred. Please try again
Your account has been disabled. Please contact support.
Too many requests. Please try again later.
OpenTrace is scanning to keep you safe! :)
Restart phone if this notification disappears
Join me in stopping the spread of COVID-19! Download OpenTrace. Go to: https://bluetrace.io
Click on this notification to see your exposure detailed info
Scanati codul de pe foaia primita de la personalul medical.

In cazul in care ati fost testat pozitiv de catre personalul medical, puteti avertiza alti utilizatori cu care v-ati intersectat sa ia masurile necesare pentru a se proteja si de a proteja pe ceilalti.

Alerta va respecta dreptul la viata personala, astfel incat persoanele avertizate mai departe nu vor sti cine a fost persoana care a trimis aceasta avertizare.

Pentru a incepe, este necesara foaia printata de personalul medical cu codul unic QR, o conexiune la internet si acordul dumneavoastra oferit prin apasarea butonului de dedesubt.
Permiteti accesul la camera pentru a putea scana codul QR.
Accesul la camera a fost respins.
Aveti nevoie de o conexiune la internet inainte de a incepe.
Introduceti PINul primit prin SMS manual.
Asteptati sa primiti SMS cu pinul necesar validarii cererii dumneavoastra.
PIN-ul va fi introdus automat la primirea SMS-ului…
Adaugati pin-ul primit prin sms pentru a continua.
